automatic_ordering.reasoning: The provided input only contains one session ('LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach'), and there is no additional context or other sessions to compare against. Therefore, no ordering or exclusiveness constraints can be deduced.

LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach_0.speaker: Narrator
LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach_0.text: *You are entering the seat of the Absolute, home to those who targeted your Grove. They may still hunt you.*

LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach_5.speaker: Narrator
LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach_5.text: *Without an infected companion at your side, you cannot pass among the cult undetected.*

LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach_8.speaker: Player
LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach_8.text: Caution and vigilance should allow you to explore the tower unscathed.

LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach_3.speaker: Narrator
LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach_3.text: *It's risky to enter Moonrise with an unwelcome companion. You can pass as a True Soul, but they cannot.*

LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach_6.speaker: Narrator
LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach_6.text: *Be sure to keep them close, so you can speak on their behalf if the cultists ask too many questions.*

LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach_4.speaker: Narrator
LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach_4.text: *The cult know you live, but believe you to be a thrall, with your mind erased. Best not be seen here without one of your tadpoled companions.*

LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach_7.speaker: Player
LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach_7.text: Prepare to push onwards into Moonrise, whatever the risk.

LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach_9.speaker: Narrator
LoneUnwelcomeTowerVisitorApproach_9.text: *Approaching Moonrise without a tadpoled companion is a dangerous proposition. Are you willing to risk being detected by the cult?*
